tool_description: Analyzes collected database statistics to identify optimization opportunities, stale statistics, and potential performance issues.

table_stats_data.description: JSON string containing table statistics from Table Statistics Collector

index_stats_data.description: JSON string containing index statistics from Index Statistics Collector

column_stats_data.description: JSON string containing column statistics from Column Statistics Collector

staleness_threshold_days.description: Days after which statistics are considered stale (1-365)

growth_rate_threshold.description: Percentage growth rate to flag for immediate stats update (1-100)

error_messages: Invalid statistics data: Table statistics data must be valid JSON format.
Missing required data: Table statistics data is required for analysis.
Invalid staleness threshold: Must be between 1-365 days.
Invalid growth rate threshold: Must be between 1-100 percent.
Data format error: Statistics data does not match expected schema.
usage: Provide table_stats_data from Table Statistics Collector. Optionally include index_stats_data and column_stats_data for comprehensive analysis. Adjust staleness_threshold_days and growth_rate_threshold based on your maintenance requirements.

stale_statistics.description: List of objects with stale statistics requiring updates

high_priority_updates.description: Statistics requiring immediate attention due to high growth

optimization_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations for improving statistics maintenance
